about_the_game:
Plan your heist with 6 brand-new historic characters! Perfect your strategy with Einstein's time manipulation device, Al Capone's secret tunnels, and Karl Marx's communes. Or try to catch the robbers with Marie Curie's X-Ray Scanner and her radioactive materials, Caesar's legions, and the team buffs of Queen Elizabeth.

Robbers:
  • Albert Einstein - Place an experimental machine that slows nearby time, slow down the round timer, and use chrono grenades to help your team rob the bank
  • Karl Marx - Give stolen money to NPCs instead of depositing it to gain more and more boni for your team and destroy walls with your mighty hammer
  • Al Capone - Dig secret escape tunnels for your team, and sell moonshine to NPCs for additional profit

Cops:
  • Caesar - Use your legionaries to protect strategic points, while charging the robbers with your superior melee attacks
  • Marie Curie - Place an X-ray scanner to monitor robber activity through walls, and manipulate loot with radioactive traces to track down the thieves
  • Queen Elizabeth I - Support your team with stat boosts and increase the amount of money robbers have to steal, but make sure they don't steal your crown
